title: Woman Tipping Hand

description:
A woman tipping her hand by her shoulder as if she’s carrying a tray of drinks or flipping her hair.

This emoji is commonly used to express sassiness or sarcasm.

The earlier gender-unspecified version of this emoji, üíÅ Person Tipping Hand, was originally depicted as a woman across most platforms.
apple_vendor_description: The woman tipping hand emoji on Apple devices displays a graceful hand with a medium skin tone, elegantly tilted as if offering a helpful suggestion or a playful rhetorical question, all rendered with Apple‚Äôs signature glossy 3D finish and soft, rounded edges. The realistic lighting highlights the delicate curve of the wrist and fingers, conveying a friendly, approachable, and slightly sassy demeanor. This emoji is commonly used on Apple devices to express sass, sarcasm, or a lighthearted, confident gesture in conversation.
